PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-12712010-10-21,  ,  HEALTH,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Surface Coating Materials Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SURFACE COATING MATERIALS REGULATIONS in order to align Canadian regulations with those of the United States in respect of total lead levels in surface coating materials and certain products with surface coating materials applied to them by lowering the total lead limit in surface coating materials from 600 mg/kg to 90 mg/kg.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0224 Publication Date: 2010-11-10
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Surface Coating Materials Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SURFACE COATING MATERIALS REGULATIONS  in order to align Canadian regulations with those of the United States in respect of total lead levels in surface coating materials and certain products with surface coating materials applied to them by lowering the total lead limit in surface coating materials from 600 mg/kg to 90 mg/kg.
